summary: This is an email from attorney Brittany Henderson to an unspecified recipient, forwarding a previous message from October 2019. The forwarded message indicates that Henderson's firm represents four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are ready to be interviewed and will be present at a victim briefing in New York in October 2019.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney representing four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein, coordinating interviews for them with an unspecified recipient. She is based in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator against whom the four represented victims have experiences.

connections.description: Henderson is an attorney representing victims who allege experiences with Epstein.

events.title: Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: A victim briefing is scheduled to take place in New York. Four additional victims represented by Brittany Henderson will be present.

events.title: Potential Interview Dates
events.description: The following day after the victim briefing, proposed as an alternative date for scheduling interviews with the victims.

keyFacts: Attorney Brittany Henderson represents four additional victims of Jeffrey Epstein who are ready to speak about their experiences.
The victims were scheduled to be present at a victim briefing in New York on October 23, 2019.
The correspondence is an attempt to schedule interviews with these victims on October 23 or 24, 2019.
The email was forwarded on December 1, 2020, indicating ongoing legal coordination related to the Epstein case.
